name: On top of corpses
description:
Story:

The player has been cursed to have infinite lives, but every time they die they leave a stone statue behind. 

You'll have to surpass many challenges to let the character die in peace.

How to play:

You can move using WASD, you have a normal and double jump with space. To beat the levels you'll have to strategically die in certain places to create statues that will be necessary to beat the level. You'll have to be fast because the statues will decompose at a certain time.

Theme and limitation:

In this case failure is inevitable because you are required to die to beat the game. You also have to sacrifice your life multiple times to end the game.

Credits:

Programming: Ojornag

Art: o_lobster

Music: HarumachiMusic

Sfx: Mixkit
